mean_cn: n. （由两个或以上师组成的）军，兵团；一群人；特别小组
mean_en: a large unit of an army, consisting of two or more divisions; a group of people involved in a particular job or activity
sentence: A corps of designers are discussing the new project.
sentence_trans: 一群设计师正在讨论新项目。
word_etyma: corp身体，团体 + s复数 → corps军队，团体
